tool_description: Captures and analyzes infrared images to reveal underdrawings, pentimenti, and subsurface features invisible to normal vision, providing insights into artistic technique and authenticity.

ir_wavelength_range.description: Infrared wavelength range (near, short-wave, mid-wave, long-wave)

image_enhancement.description: Apply digital enhancement to improve visibility

comparison_mode.description: Create side-by-side comparison with visible light image

error_messages: Invalid artwork_id: Provide a valid artwork identifier from metadata record.
Unsupported IR wavelength range: Use one of [near, short-wave, mid-wave, long-wave].
IR imaging equipment error: Check that infrared camera is properly calibrated and functioning.
Insufficient contrast: Artwork may not be suitable for infrared examination due to material properties.
usage: Specify artwork and infrared wavelength range. System captures IR images and processes them to reveal subsurface features and artistic techniques.

underdrawings_detected.description: Whether underdrawings or preliminary sketches are visible

pentimenti_locations.description: Areas where artist made changes or corrections

technique_insights.description: Artistic techniques revealed through IR analysis

subsurface_features.description: Description of features visible only in infrared
